page.title: 03Community Spirit in Insch.
page.content: The crowning of the Gala Queen and her attendants preceded the Gala Concert on the Wednesday evening. Entertainment included fiddle music, recitations,songs,dances and comedy sketches.Such a variety of local talent kept the large audience happy. The following evening there was a 5_ a_side football competition and on Friday evening there was a Fancy Dress Competition and parade with many colourful and imaginative costumes on display.This was followed by an Under 13 Disco in the Community Centre. Saturday saw an Inter Village Sports Competition where football,netball, relays,sprints and sack races brought out the competitive instincts in young and old alike.The Dunnydeer Hill Race brought out some fit and not so fit athletes and the hot sunny afternoon didn't make the race any easier!
